subject: [Mhln] MegaDik will work on both circumcised and non circumcised penis.
body:
Second month you will notice an increase in penis size of up to 1 inches, plus an increase in Girth (Width) of 5%, plus all the benefits of the first month. Recent discoveries in herbal science have shed new light on the subject of penis enlargement. Research has revealed that your penis has the ability to grow beyond its current size when fully erect. Like all the other muscles in your body, your penis is actually designed to grow!
http://bprne.com
The body grows and develops GRADUALLY, not over night! This is why MegaDik is the greatest breakthrough product in the history of male enhancement! Penis enlargement, as we know it, will never be the same.
